title: The ONLY Garden Planting Schedule Youll EVER Need

tasks.task: Design a garden planting schedule for different zones
subtasks: Research planting times for 35 popular vegetables
Include all 12 months in the planting schedule
Note areas where nothing can be grown in winter
Indicate average last frost dates in different colors
Highlight indoor seed starting, outdoor transplant, and direct sowing times
Provide harvesting times for each vegetable

tasks.task: Create a zone-specific garden planning schedule
subtasks: Visualize the entire gardening year for preparation
Adjust for cool and warm season crops
Include references for local weather variations

tasks.task: Use the schedule as a reference tool
subtasks: Frame the 24x36 inch poster size schedule
Keep the schedule accessible for gardening purposes
